'''''bara''''' is an [[Noldorin|Exilic Noldorin]] word meaning "fiery; eager". The word is said to be "frequent in masculine names".<ref name=Ety>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 351</ref>
==Etymology==
*[[Sundocarme|Root]] [[BARÁS]]<ref name=Ety/>
==Examples==
*''[[Baragund]]''
*''[[Barahir]]''
==Cognates==
*[[Noldorin|Exilic Noldorin]] ''[[brassen]]''
